subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: If Nascar started from scratch today, Darlington Raceway would not be built. But here it sits: a hulking monument in a former cotton-and-peanut field in South Carolina.
snippet: If Nascar started from scratch today, Darlington Raceway would not be built. But here it sits: a hulking monument in a former cotton-and-peanut field in South Carolina.
